description.en: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.ar: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.br: (Quest) Um livro antigo redigido em um idioma antigo.
description.cns: 破烂的书籍，里面应该拥有祭团的秘密
description.de: (Questitem) Ein sehr altes Buch, das in einer alten Sprache verfasst ist und wohl der Schlüssel zum Geheimnis des Altars ist.
description.fi: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.fil: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.fr: Très vieux manuscrit écrit dans une langue ancienne et qui semble être la clé du secret de l'histoire de Madrigal.
description.id: Item Quest: Sebuah buku kuno yang ditulis dalam bahasa kuno.
description.it: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.jp: 分厚い装丁の古代語が記された古文書。＜紫闇の祭壇＞の秘密を解く鍵になりそうだ。（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 너무 낡아 부분 부분 닳아버린 고대어로 된 책자. 제단의 비밀을 알 수 있는 열쇠가 될 듯하다.
description.nl: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.pl: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: книга, написанная на древнем языке.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Un libro antiguo escrito en un idioma antiguo.
description.sw: Quest Item: An ancient book written in an ancient language.
description.th: Quest Item: หนังสือโบราณที่เขียนด้วยภาษาโบราณ
description.tw: [任務道具]一本用古代語言撰寫而成的書籍。
description.vi: Mục Nhiệm vụ: Một cuốn sách cổ được viết bằng ngôn ngữ cổ.
